channel.title: Hey, how do you make it so doors/gates etc open?
channel.description:
How do you i've tried editing my "objects.cfg" but that don't seem to work?
How do i do it... do i just make new entries into the objects.cfg??? but i did that for a large door and wrote in the objects.cfg that i want "null" there and it just gave me an error...
step by step tut plz???
I'll give you credits in my client... (once i get the web applet working)

item.title: Hey, how do you make it so doors/gates etc open?
item.dc:creator: @Screwy Screwy
item.description:
@Screwy wrote:

Look for case 1533: And replace it with

case 1533: if(objectX == 3183 && objectY == 3434) { ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,1531, -1); } else { ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, 0); } break;
Look for
case 2559:
And replace it with

case 2559: ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,1531, -2); break;

Thats makes doors stay open. I’ll look for gates.

Search for case 1558:
Replace it with case 1558: ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID+2, 0); break;

Read full topic
